entry.title: The Space Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: milkyway

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,507Chapters: 7/8Kudos: 23

Summary: Derek Hale has spent most of his life keeping people at arm’s length. Stiles Stilinski has spent most of his life ignoring personal space entirely. Somewhere between late-night phone calls, flirty text messages, Virginia Woolf quotes, a weekend getaway and a long walk on the beach, they find a way to meet in the middle.Or:Derek learns how to have things—love, warmth, home—without the fear of losing them. Stiles makes it his life’s mission to ensure Derek is thoroughly overwhelmed by affection. There are hand-holding lessons, aggressive cuddles, an alarming amount of literary analysis, a cooking-induced identity crisis, and way too much texting from work.It’s slow, messy, and absolutely inevitable.

entry.title: Guided by a Beating Heart
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,649Chapters: 43/51Kudos: 55

Summary: (Further continuation of Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU)After defeating their second Goa'uld System Lord in less than a year, the residents of Beacon Hills must adapt to their ever-changing world.Cora Hale has broken the family curse, but now she must continue her work of rehabilitating the Hale-Littlefield Pack while keeping Beacon Hills safe for all its residents.Stiles Stilinski continues his journey of recovery and self-discovery after his possession.Derek Hale faces new challenges as he starts going on offworld missions through the Stargate.

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,823Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn’t.No explanations, no goodbyes—just the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn’t understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don’t need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.summary:
Author: misteeirene

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,870Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 358

Summary: Stiles runs away from Beacon Hills after he was pushed out of the pack. At his lowest, he meets someone who teaches him what true love is and what it’s like to be someone’s number one priority. After a brutal attack by another alpha, Stiles looses the man he had planned to spend the rest of his life with. Can he forgive his father, Derek, and old pack and allow them to help him heal?

entry.title: On the Edge of the Blade
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,624Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 40

Summary: Stiles Stilinski learned early on that perfection isn’t a choice—it’s a necessity. On the ice, every missed jump has a price, and every mistake cuts like a blade. He doesn’t have time for distractions. He can’t afford to fail.Then Derek Hale shows up.Popular, reserved, and completely outside Stiles’ world, Derek isn’t supposed to notice someone like him. But he does. And when he steps onto the ice for the first time, Stiles knows he should push him away—before he gets hurt, before he gets too close.Before he realizes that Stiles is already falling, and this might be the one fall he can’t get up from.

entry.title: Magna Cum Ardoriter
entry.summary:
Author: Waddiwasii

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,876Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 41

Summary: Stiles can’t help but feel like he’s been lied to.Legally Blonde all but guaranteed immediate mastery over all coursework and an effortless discovery of his one true purpose. Instead, every class is a confusing nightmare, and the only revelation he’s had so far is that he might actually be too socially incompetent to make friends.Given that the sum of his accumulated attempts at having a quintessential, life-changing, college experience is a resounding zero, Stiles can’t help but reach one very disappointing conclusion:Elle Woods is a fucking liar.

Summary: Every St. Patrick’s Day, Derek experiences bizarre misfortunes. Stiles is convinced it’s a leprechaun shifter’s curse. Cue dramatic storytelling, pack laughter, and Derek’s growing regret for ever celebrating.
